thread.title: LeBron James Mocks Lonzo Ball’s Ugly Shooting Motion Before Cavs-Bulls Game
thread.title_full: LeBron James Mocks Lonzo Ball’s Ugly Shooting Motion Before Cavs-Bulls Game

author: Jorge Alonso
title: LeBron James Mocks Lonzo Ball’s Ugly Shooting Motion Before Cavs-Bulls Game
text:
Last month, LeBron James got into a beef with LaVar Ball after the elder Ball said that LeBron’s sons were probably going to be whack at basketball. 
It seems like LeBron is ready to punish LaVar’s son Lonzo Ball for his father’s actions. 
Check out as LeBron mocks Lonzo by doing his patented shooting motion before today’s Cavs-Bulls game. 
streamable.com/e/6uyoy
Here’s Lonzo’s shot to compare. 
"[Lonzo Ball's] jump shot isn't strange when it goes through the net!" @TheJetOnTNT & @ClarkKelloggCBS demonstrate #MarchMadness pic.twitter.com/TqdSXtwV3w 
— TurnerSportsPR (@TurnerSportsPR) March 25, 2017 

LeBron is so petty.
